name: Mediacase
overview:
Mediacase is the best way to manage & deliver videos from the cloud. Forget about hard drives & file transfers. Mediacase presents your videos on gorgeous pages where clients and teammates can view, discuss & download your masterpiece.

Breathtaking Video Delivery - Your videos deserve a beautiful presentation. Mediacase automatically creates gorgeous delivery pages where your videos take center stage. Grant clients or colleagues private access to instantly watch, download, and comment on your video.

Collaborate with your Team - Whether you’re producing, reviewing, or managing video content, Mediacase puts your video in the center of the conversation. Simply invite teammates or clients onboard, and begin collaborating from anywhere in the world.

Manage your Videos in the Cloud - Say goodbye to clunky drives, DVDs, and file transfers. Mediacase stores your full resolution videos in the cloud. No matter where you happen to be, managing your video library is fast and easy with search, browsing, and categorization.
